ygData.subject: Re: Life is soooo Good!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... and ... devoting ... now ... Na...At the moment I am still waitinf for a friend to come and take a crack at my computer. For some reason I can t get my new
ygData.messageBody:
--- In theeverquesttavern@y..., xela_orcbane <no_reply@y...> wrote:
> I'm not sure if I missed it, but...
>
> Did you already choose a server, class, race etc.??
>
> Just curious-- I'm one of those that took a little bit of playing
and
> creating new chars. before I found my "main." Not has bad as some
> who've played 20 chars to lvl 7. In fact, my highest char is stuck
> at lv 40 because I found that I love the rogue class and am
devoting
> all my time to this "alt." He's lvl 31 already. Never thought i'd
> live a dwarf, but Rumbl is pretty kewl. His beard was a nice red
> color until he went to Unrest-- Undead affected him severely, and
now
> his beard is white.
>
> Good luck getting in game!!
>
> Rumbl
> Ravashing dwarven rogue
> 31st level
> Xev
Na...At the moment I am still waitinf for a friend to come and take a
crack at my computer. For some reason I can't get my new video card
to work. *sheesh* I did everything that my cousin told me to do. I
bought a new mem chip so that's all cool. I went and bought a 32?MB
AGP vid card and installed it like the directions said to. Anyway,
long story short is my colors are all washed out and the icons are
huge! But that's ok 'cause I am now on campus and life is good! LOL
it was so nice to wake up this morning(Friday) at 0900! The Raven
(P.S. I think I will give Xev a try and see how it goes, but I do
have to see if any of my friends are still on E'ci.)
